verses.verse: Then <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> against <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%>: and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5176>Nahash<s%>, <S%H3772>Make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us, and we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee.

And <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> them, On <S%H2063>this<s%> condition will I <S%H3772>make<s%> a covenant with you, that I may thrust <S%H5365>out<s%> all your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> it for a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> upon all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Give us <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H7503>respite<s%>, that we may <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> unto all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and then, if there be no man to <S%H3467>save<s%> us, we will come <S%H3318>out<s%> to thee. Give: Heb. Forbear us

Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H1697>tidings<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voices<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>.

And, behold, <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1241>herd<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field<s%>; and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What aileth the <S%H5971>people<s%> that they <S%H1058>weep<s%>? And they <S%H5608>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>tidings<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>.

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> upon <S%H7586>Saul<s%> when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> those <S%H1697>tidings<s%>, and his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and hewed them in <S%H5408>pieces<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them throughout all the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H4397>messengers<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Whosoever cometh not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, so shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto his <S%H1241>oxen<s%>. And the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they came <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>consent<s%>. with: Heb. as one man

And when he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in <S%H966>Bezek<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%>, Thus shall ye <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead<s%> <S%H1568><s%>, To <S%H4279>morrow<s%>, by that time the <S%H8121>sun<s%> be <S%H2527>hot<s%>, ye shall have <S%H8668>help<s%>. And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>shewed<s%> it to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%>; and they were <S%H8055>glad<s%>. help: or, deliverance

Therefore the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> we will come <S%H3318>out<s%> unto you, and ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with us all that <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto you.

And it was so on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4264>host<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H5983>Ammonites<s%> until the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>: and it came to pass, that they which <S%H7604>remained<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, so that <S%H8147>two<s%> of them were not <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8050>Samuel<s%>, Who is he that <S%H559>said<s%>, Shall <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> over us? <S%H5414>bring<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%>, that we may put them to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, There shall not a <S%H376>man<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>: for to <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, and <S%H2318>renew<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> there.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; and there they made <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; and there they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and there <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>.
